title: Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up
descriptions:
**Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up**

Get ready for a hilarious and fast-paced family game night with the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game! Designed for kids aged 8 and up, this exciting game is perfect for families with kids who love to challenge their parents.

**Gameplay:**

In this edition of Taboo, kids and parents compete against each other to guess words without saying forbidden words. The game comes with two decks of cards: one for kids and one for adults. Each deck contains 130 cards, with over 1,000 guess words in total. The kids' deck features familiar words, while the adult deck has varied words to keep things challenging.

**Game Components:**

* 2 decks of cards (kids and adults)
* 1 squeaker
* 1 one-minute timer

**Objective:**

Get your teammates to guess the words on the cards without saying the forbidden words. The team with the most points wins!

**Penalty:**

If you say a forbidden word, the opposing team gets a point. The squeaker adds an extra level of fun and excitement to the game.

**Play Time:**

Fast-paced, timed rounds keep the game exciting and engaging. Play with your family and friends for hours of laughter and fun.

**Features:**

* 2-4 players
* Ages 8 and up
* Family board game
* Kids vs. Parents theme
* Includes timer and squeaker
* Over 1,000 guess words
* 260 cards in total

**Brand:**

Hasbro Gaming

**Buy Now:**

Get ready to challenge your kids and have a blast with the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game. Order now and start creating unforgettable family memories!

**Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game Ages 8 and Up**

**Get Ready for a Fun-Filled Family Game Night!**

Introduce a new level of excitement to your family game nights with the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game. Designed for kids aged 8 and up, this fast-paced game is perfect for families who love to laugh and have fun together.

**Gameplay Overview**

In this edition of Taboo, kids and adults compete against each other in a hilarious word-guessing game. The goal is to get your teammates to guess the correct words without saying the "forbidden" words. With over 1,000 guess words and 260 cards, the game offers endless hours of entertainment.

**What's Included**

* 2 decks of cards: 1 for kids and 1 for adults, each with 130 cards
* 1 one-minute timer to add an element of excitement and pressure
* 1 squeaker to keep the game lively and fun

**How to Play**

Divide into teams and take turns describing the words on the cards without saying the forbidden words. The opposing team gets a point if a forbidden word is said. The team with the most points at the end of the game wins!

**Features**

* Fast-paced, timed rounds to keep the game exciting and engaging
* Familiar guess words for kids and varied guess words for adults to cater to different age groups
* Standard forbidden words for adults and varying forbidden words for kids to add an element of surprise
* Penalty system where saying forbidden words results in a point for the opposing team

**Why You'll Love It**

* Perfect for families with kids aged 8 and up
* Encourages teamwork, communication, and creative thinking
* Simple to learn, but challenging to master
* Great for building bonds and creating lasting memories with your family

**Get Ready to Taboo!**

Order the Hasbro Gaming Taboo Kids vs. Parents Family Board Game today and experience the thrill of a fun-filled family game night!
